Irssi Script /nicklist

  1. Go to configuration directory 
    $ mkdir ~/.irssi/scripts
$ cd ~/.irssi/scripts
  2. Download the script 
    $ wget http://scripts.irssi.org/scripts/nicklist.pl
  3. Run irssi 
    $ screen irssi
$ /run nicklist
$ /nicklist screen
*****
Written by Putra on 10 April 2017
